column7: In design studio format, students work on capstone projects for the Bachelor of Science in Sustainable Design degree. Students receive regular feedback and critique throughout the semester in the form of desk critiques, pin-ups, and formal reviews with Illinois Faculty and guests from other institutions. 5 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: FAA 430. Limited to undergraduate majors.
column9: 5 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: FAA 430. Limited to undergraduate majors.
